id.description: A unique identifier for this extension.

type.description: The type always has to be set to "extension".

name.description: Display name to be shown in the installer.

description.description: A brief description of the extensions functionality. Shown in the list of extensions.

url.description: URL of the GitHub repository. Used to install the extension.

tags.description: List of tags to classify this extension.

thumb.description: URL to a thumbnail. Should have aspect ratio of 2:1 (twice as wide as it is tall).
